description:
Take your splitboarding game to a whole new level. With a stiff flex, the Jones MTB BOA performs in all terrain types and snow conditions. Steep gully climbs, approaches and scrambling are all made easier thanks Vibram outsoles and crampon compatibility. The cherry on top is the Elite thermomoldable liners for optimal comfort and control. Boots that can handle the climbing equally as well as the shredding are boots you need to meet.

  • Fully taped interior seams and weather-resistant gaiter offer excellent waterproofing
  • Walk-mode collar releases via the H4 Coiler BOA and TX3 lace for comfortable hiking and skinning
  • Dual BOA closure system to dial in the perfect fit
  • 100% heat-mouldable Elite liners use High Rebound Energy foam and Intuition foam for energy transfer and damping
  • Elite insole has interchangeable arch support
  • Recoil flex control uses 2 removable flex rods to customize stiffness
  • Moulded toecap is made of light, strong and durable TPU
  • TPU airframe exoskeleton is light but still stiff
  • Vibram® soles with grippy mountaineering tread
  • Heel welt on outsole is compatible with strap or semi-automatic crampons
name: ThirtyTwo Jones MTB Boa '22 Snowboard Boots - Men's
